entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Moncton Roméo LeBlanc Int'l Airport 12:00 AM ADT Wednesday 12 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 8.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 19 km
Humidity: 64 %
Dewpoint: 2.1°C
Wind: SE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 3 except minus 7 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Low minus 3 except minus 7 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 11 April 2023
